column4: hi. after apt-get update and apt-get dist-upgrade yesterday and then a reboot, my dhclient segfaults consistently
I'm having to use another computer to be on the IRC channel
I sure could use some help
do you know how to use a core file?
it had better.  do you know how to interpret the gdb stack trace?
yes, I'm very familiar with gdb; but there's no symbols
if you can paste the stack trace onto the paste web site, we might get lucky and recognize something
you might try reinstalling the package that includes the dhclient program.
hard to know without much more info.
probably not worth the time to track it down.
